chart_metadata.name: netbootxyz
chart_metadata.description: netboot.xyz lets you PXE boot various operating system installers or utilities from a single tool over the network.

runAsContext.description: The container starts as root, then NGINX and TFTP spawn under normal user accounts.

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: TFTP requires this ability to set permissions for sub-processes.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: TFTP requires this ability to set permissions for sub-processes.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: TFTP requires this ability to set permissions for sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: TFTP requires this ability to switch user for sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: TFTP requires this ability to switch group for sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SYS_CHROOT
capabilities.description: TFTP requires this ability to spawn child processes.

capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE
capabilities.description: TFTP requires this ability to bind to port 69 for TFTP.

capabilities.name: KILL
capabilities.description: TFTP requires this ability to kill sub-processes.

attrs.label: TFTPD Options
attrs.description: Additional TFTPD options.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for netboot.xyz.

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description:
Bind to the host network. </br>
Required for TFTP.

attrs.label: TFTP Port
attrs.description: The TFTP port for netboot.xyz.

attrs.label: Portal HTTP Port
attrs.description: The HTTP port for the netboot.xyz Portal.

attrs.label: Assets Port
attrs.description: The Assets port for the netboot.xyz, configures the NGINX_PORT variable on the container.

attrs.label: netboot.xyz Config Storage
attrs.description: The path to store netboot.xyz configuration.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for netboot.xyz.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for netboot.xyz.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

1.0.4.app_readme:
netboot.xyz

netboot.xyz lets you PXE boot various operating system installers or utilities from a single tool over the network.
1.0.4.detailed_readme:
netboot.xyz

netboot.xyz lets you PXE boot various operating system installers or utilities from a single tool over the network.
